bibl.title: The Structural Units of the Gospel Tradition.
bibl.note: The pericope is the structural unit. On pp. 55-56 the Oxyrhynchus Logia (= van Haelst 593-595) and the new Unknown Gospel P. Egerton 2 (= van Haelst 586) are put under contribution.
bibl.seg: Riddle Donald Wayne, The Structural Units of the Gospel Tradition.
The pericope is the structural unit. On pp. 55-56 the Oxyrhynchus Logia (= van Haelst 593-595) and the new Unknown Gospel P. Egerton 2 (= van Haelst 586) are put under contribution.
